Constructor Detail

BoundedBuffer

public BoundedBuffer(int capacity)
Constructor of generic bounded buffer.

Parameters:
capacity - Capacity of bounded buffer. Set it to -1 if you don't want a maximum capacity.
Method Detail

add

public void add(E o)
Adds new item o to bounded buffer. If maximum capacity is reached, this new item will overwrite the oldest one in the buffer.

Parameters:
o - Item to add

get

public E get(int i)
Get item with index i.

Parameters:
i - Index of item.
Returns:
Item

remove

public boolean remove(E o)
Removes an Item from bounded buffer.

Parameters:
o - Item to remove
Returns:
true, if item was removed. false, if item was not found in bounded buffer.
